title: DDFP 421: Divisional Round Preview & LA Rams
itunes:title: DDFP 421: Divisional Round Preview & LA Rams
description:
Shek sits down with Handsome Hank and Matt Harmon to discuss a very busy week in the NFL. First, the guys talk about the return of the Los Angeles Rams, and how to adopt them as a fan. Hank talks about his love for the playoffs, and Harmon talks about his love for the Panthers. After Football Baby makes his picks, the guys make their Red Challenge Flag Picks. Will Russell Wilson and the Seahawks upset Cam Newton's Panthers? Find out more on DDFP.  Watch the full show: https://youtu.be/JTHBY1aFAKg

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
